question: Mr. and Mrs. Mustard have six daughters and each daughter has one brother. But there are only 9 people in the family, how is that possible?
answer: Each daughter shares the same brother.
distractor1: Some daughters get married and have their own family.
distractor2: Some brothers were not loved by family and moved away.
choice_list: ['Some daughters get married and have their own family.', 'Each daughter shares the same brother.', 'Some brothers were not loved by family and moved away.', 'None of above.']

question: The same parents gave birth to two girls at the same time on the same day in the same month, but they are not twins. Why is this even a possibility?
answer: They were not born in the same year.
distractor1: One girl ran away from home at a young age.
distractor2: One gril has father's last name, one girl has mother's last name.
choice_list: ['One girl ran away from home at a young age.', 'One gril has father's last name, one girl has mother's last name.', 'They were not born in the same year.', 'None of above.']

question: You are running so fast but you're not getting closer. Where are you?

In a small village, two farmers are working in their fields - a diligent farmer and a lazy farmer. The hardworking farmer is the son of the lazy farmer, but the lazy farmer is not the father of the hardworking farmer. Can you explain this unusual relationship?
choice_list: ['The lazy farmer is his mother.', 'The lazy farmer is not a responsible father as he is lazy.', 'The diligent farmer devoted himself to the farm and gradually forgot his father.', 'None of above.']

question: Why do old people consume more food than young people.
choice_list: ['Older adults may have specific dietary requirements to address age-related issues', 'Older people require increased nutrient intake to support overall health and well-being.', 'Because older people live longer.', 'None of above.']

question: In what year did Christmas Day and New Year's Day fall in the same year?
choice_list: ['In the first year of each century.', 'It happens every year.', 'In the period of BC.', 'None of above.']
